name: gss_OID_desc_struct
desc: The structure for an OID descriptor that exchanges object identifiers with many GSS-API functions.

items.name: var elements: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!
items.desc: A pointer to the octets that make up the object identifier.

items.name: var length: OM_uint32
items.desc: The number of octets in the object identifier.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initialize a new, empty object identifier.

items.name: init(length: OM_uint32, elements: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!)
items.desc: Initialize a new object identifier with the given array of octets.
